desc: Perfume House Of Kalliope Amorphous. Avant-garde handmade artisan perfume oils with gothic, historical, victorian, sacred, strange, and poetic aesthetics. A darkly elegant niche perfumery featuring a large selection of gothic-themed and Victorian inspired perfumes.

layout.text: Experience the magic of olfactory art: expertly handcrafted, unconventional, hauntingly beautiful, and as unique as you are.
